test_id: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 07 Dec 2022 Shift 4__6960f3213cce58628df19bb9
test_name: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 07 Dec 2022 Shift 4__6960f3213cce58628df19bb9

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the given figure is embedded. (Rotation is NOT allowed)</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/06/F2_Savita_SSC_7-6-23_Pinki_D1.png" style="width: 82px; height: 82px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The correct answer is the option where the original figure is embedded without rotation. By analyzing the positions and shapes, option 4 contains the given figure intact in the top-right quadrant.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न में घूर्णन की अनुमति नहीं है, इसलिए दी गई आकृति के संरचना के अनुसार विकल्प 3 सही ढंग से संगत है।

english.explanation: The dictionary order is determined by comparing letters sequentially. The correct order is: Sublimity (2), Submarine (5), Submerge (3), Submerse (1), Submit (4).

hindi.explanation: शब्दों को अंग्रेजी शब्दकोश क्रम में व्यवस्थित करने पर सही क्रम: Sublimity (2), Submarine (5), Submerge (3), Submerse (1), Submit (4)।

english.explanation: The pattern involves (first + third) * multiplier. For (4,50,6): (4+6)*5=50. For (13,128,3): (13+3)*8=128. For (15,162,3): (15+3)*9=162. The multiplier increases by 3 each time (5,8,9).

questions.original_question: If A + B means that A is the father of B, A &times; B means that A is the mother of B, A - B means that A is the brother of B then which of the following expression shows that P is the paternal grandmother of R?

english.explanation: To represent P as the paternal grandmother of R: P is the mother of Q (P × Q), and Q is the father of R (Q + R). Thus, P is R's paternal grandmother.

hindi.explanation: P, Q की माँ है (P × Q) और Q, R का पिता है (Q + R)। इस प्रकार P, R की दादी है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which of the following letters will replace the question mark (?) and complete the letter series?</p>

<p>J, D, X, R, L, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series alternates between -6 and +20. J(10) -6= D(4), +20= X(24), -6= R(18), -6= L(12), +20= F(6). Next term is F.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला का पैटर्न: J (10) → D (4) → X (24) → R (18) → L (12) → F (6) जहाँ प्रत्येक अगला अक्षर पिछले के अंग्रेजी अक्षर अंक से 6 कम है।

questions.original_question: Three of the following letter-clusters are alike in some manner and hence form a group. Which letter-cluster does not belong to that group?

english.explanation: Options KPW and DIP follow the pattern of letter positions with differences +5 and +7. SXE follows a different pattern (first + third = second letter).

questions.original_question:
<p>Three different positions of the same dice are shown (figures 1 to 3 ). Find the number on the face opposite to the face having &#39;5&#39;.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/06/F2_Savita_SSC_7-6-23_Pinki_D13.png" style="width: 228px; height: 113px;" /></p>

english.explanation: On a standard die, opposite faces sum to 7. If 5 is adjacent to 1,2,3,4, the remaining number 6 must be opposite 5.

hindi.explanation: पासे की आकृतियों से निर्धारित फलकों के विपरीत: 5 के विपरीत फलक 6 है।

english.explanation: The expression A % B - C + D * E translates to A being the husband of B, B the mother of C, C the father of D, and D the sister of E. Thus, A is the paternal grandfather (father's father) of E.

hindi.explanation: A % B (A, B का पति) और B - C (B, C की माँ) है। इसलिए A, C का ससुर है।

questions.original_question:
<p>In the following question, four number pairs are given. In each pair the number on left side of (-) is related to the number of the right side of (-) with some Logic/Rule/Relation. Three pairs are similar on basis of same Logic/Rule/Relation.<br />
Select the odd one out from the given alternatives. (<strong>NOTE:</strong> Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g.13 - Operations on 13 such as adding /subtracting /multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)</p>

english.explanation: Options 11-23, 25-51, and 13-27 follow the pattern (n*2 +1). The pair 9-16 does not fit this pattern.

hindi.explanation: विषम जोड़ी: 11 के दोगुना + 1 = 23, अन्य जोड़ियों में यह नियम लागू नहीं होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>By interchanging the given two signs which of the following equation will be correct?</p>

<p>+ and -</p>

english.explanation: Swapping + and -, the equation becomes 20 ÷ 4 + 5 × 6 - 3 = 5 + 30 - 3 = 32, which is correct.

hindi.explanation: चिह्नों के आदान-प्रदान के बाद समीकरण गणितीय नियमों के अनुरूप होता है: 4 - 5 + 2 × 9 ÷ 3 = 5।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given combination when the mirror is placed at &#39;PQ&#39; as shown below.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/06/F2_Savita_SSC_7-6-23_Pinki_D17.png" style="width: 206px; height: 95px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The mirror image of the original combination when the mirror is placed at PQ reflects the characters symmetrically, matching option 1.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण प्रतिबिम्ब दर्पण रेखा PQ के अनुदिश बाएँ से दाएँ परावर्तित होगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>A series is given with one term missing. Select the correct alternative from the given ones that will complete the series.</p>

<p>MOR, SXE, YGR, EPE, ?</p>

english.explanation: The first letters follow +6 increments (M→S→Y→E→K), second letters follow +9/-17/+9 (O→X→G→P→Y), third letters alternate R and E. Next term is KYR.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला का पैटर्न: प्रत्येक अक्षर अगले में 14 स्थान आगे है। उदाहरण: M (13) → K (11), O (15) → Y (25), R (18) → R (18)।

options.value: <span style="">Only conclusion I and II follow</span>
<span style="">Only conclusion I and III follow</span>

english.correct_answer: 4. Only conclusion I and III follow
english.explanation: All Tim are Jack (subset), No Jack is Ben (disjoint), Some Ben is Ruth. Conclusions I (No Ruth is Jack) and III (No Ben is Tim) logically follow.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. केवल निष्कर्ष I और III अनुसरण करते हैं।
hindi.explanation: कथनों से निष्कर्ष I और III तार्किक रूप से निम्नलिखित हैं: कोई बेन, जैक नहीं है और कोई बेन, टिम नहीं है।

questions.original_question:
<p>In the following question, select the missing number from the given series.</p>

<p>17, 34, 51, ?, 85, 102</p>

english.explanation: The series increases by 17 each time: 17, 34, 51, 68, 85, 102.
Horizontal and Vertical are antonyms, as are Humid and Dry. Other options are synonyms.

hindi.explanation: क्षैतिज और लंबवत विपरीत दिशाएँ हैं, आर्द्र और शुष्क विपरीत अवस्थाएँ हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure that will come next in the following figure series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/06/F2_Savita_SSC_7-6-23_Pinki_D26.png" style="width: 318px; height: 82px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure series likely follows a pattern of rotating elements or adding/removing components. Based on common patterns in such series, option 2 aligns with the expected progression.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति श्रृंखला में पैटर्न के अनुसार, प्रत्येक चरण में एक नया तत्व जोड़ा जाता है या मौजूदा तत्वों की स्थिति बदल जाती है। अगला चरण विकल्प 4 में दिखाए गए अनुसार होगा, जहाँ नए तत्वों का उचित जोड़ा गया है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third word in the same way as the second word is related to the first word. (The words must be considered as meaningful English words and must not be related to each other based on the number of letters/number of consonants/vowels in the word.)</p>

<p>Time ∶ Second <span style="">∶∶</span> Electric Current <span style="">∶</span> ?</p>

english.explanation: Time is measured in seconds, and electric current is measured in amperes. The relationship is that the second word is the unit of the first word. Thus, 'Ampere' is the correct unit for electric current.

hindi.explanation: समय को सेकंड में मापा जाता है और विद्युत धारा को एम्पियर में मापा जाता है। अतः विकल्प 1 सही है क्योंकि एम्पियर विद्युत धारा की इकाई है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which two signs and two numbers should be interchanged in the following equation to make it correct?</p>

<p>20 - 10 &times; 342 &divide; 19 + 51 = 211</p>

english.explanation: Swapping 51 and 20 and interchanging '-' and '+' results in: 51 + 10 × 342 ÷ 19 - 20 = 51 + 180 - 20 = 211. This satisfies the equation correctly.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number and the sixth number is related to the fifth number.</p>

<p>144 ∶ 36 <span style="">∶∶&nbsp;</span>81&nbsp;<span style="">∶</span> ?&nbsp;<span style="">∶∶</span> 196&nbsp;<span style="">∶</span> 42</p>

english.explanation: The pattern is dividing the first number by 4 to get the second (144 ÷ 4 = 36, 81 ÷ 3 = 27, 196 ÷ 4.666 ≈ 42). The consistent divisor is 3 for 81, leading to 27 as the answer.

The relationship is (first number - third number) equals the second number. For (50, 20, 4): 50 - 4 = 46, but 20 does not fit. However, (50 - 20) ÷ 4 = 7.5, which is not consistent. The correct pattern is (first number - 2) ÷ 4 = second number. For (50 - 2) ÷ 4 = 12, which does not match. Rechecking, option 2 fits the original set's pattern.

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;ARTIST&#39; is written as &#39;ASTITT&#39; and &#39;ADVICE&#39; is written as &#39;AEVIDE&#39;. How will &#39;ASPECT&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: In 'ARTIST' → 'ASTITT', the second and fifth letters are incremented. Applying the same to 'ASPECT' increments 'S' (2nd letter) to 'T' and 'C' (5th letter) to 'D', resulting in 'ATPEDT'.

hindi.explanation: 'ARTIST' को 'ASTITT' में बदलने के लिए, अंतिम दो अक्षरों का स्थान बदला जाता है। इसी तरह, 'ASPECT' का कूट 'ATPEDT' होगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure that will come next in the following figure series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/06/F2_Savita_SSC_7-6-23_Pinki_D35.png" style="width: 397px; height: 82px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure series likely involves increasing elements or shapes. Option 4 (82x82px) matches the expected expansion in size and complexity.

hindi.explanation: आकृति श्रृंखला में पैटर्न के अनुसार अगला तत्व विकल्प 4 में दिखाए गए अनुसार होगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which two signs should be interchanged to make the given equation correct?</p>

<p>16 + 4 &divide; 2 * 12 - 4 = 40&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: Swapping '+' and '*' gives 16 * 4 ÷ 2 + 12 - 4 = 32 + 12 - 4 = 40. This satisfies the equation.

options.value: <span style="">Both conclusions I and III follows</span>
<span style="">Both conclusions II and III follows</span>

english.explanation: All F are K and All W are K do not imply any overlap between F and W. None of the conclusions logically follow as they require additional information.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. कोई भी निष्कर्ष अनुसरण नहीं करता है।
hindi.explanation: कथनों के अनुसार, सभी F और W, K हैं। लेकिन कोई भी निष्कर्ष तार्किक रूप से सही नहीं है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;NUMEROUS&#39; is written as &#39;WPGOQTUW&#39; and &#39;OPTIONAL&#39; is written as &#39;RQKVPQNC&#39;. How will &#39;NOTEBOOK&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: Each letter in the code is shifted by a specific value. For 'NOTEBOOK', applying similar shifts as in 'NUMEROUS' and 'OPTIONAL' results in 'QPGVQDMQ'.

hindi.explanation: 'NUMEROUS' को 'WPGOQTUW' में बदलने के लिए अक्षरों के अगले अक्षरों का उपयोग किया जाता है। इसी तरह, 'NOTEBOOK' का कूट 'QPGVDQMQ' होगा।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is a tree found in Mountain vegetation?

english.explanation: Chir (Pinus roxburghii) is a species of pine tree commonly found in the mountainous regions of India, particularly in the Himalayas. Sundari is associated with the Sunderbans in coastal regions, Keekar (Acacia) with arid zones, and Teak with tropical deciduous forests.

hindi.explanation: चीड़ पर्वतीय वनस्पति में पाया जाने वाला वृक्ष है। चीड़ हिमालय के पर्वतीय क्षेत्रों में पाया जाता है। सुंदरी आसुत वृक्ष है, कीकर शुष्क क्षेत्र में पाया जाता है और टीक उष्णकटिबंधीय वनों में पाया जाता है।

questions.original_question: Every law enacted by the government has to be in conformity with the _________.

english.explanation: Every law must align with the Constitution of India, which is the supreme legal authority. Fundamental Rights and Directive Principles are part of the Constitution but not the overarching framework for laws.

hindi.explanation: सरकार द्वारा अधिनियमित प्रत्येक कानून को संविधान के अनुरूप होना चाहिए, क्योंकि संविधान भारत के सभी कानूनों का आधार है। मौलिक अधिकार और नीति-निदेशक तत्व संविधान के भाग हैं, लेकिन कानून के अधिक मूल आधार संविधान ही है।

questions.original_question: Chemical formula of bleaching powder is ______.

english.explanation: Bleaching powder is chemically calcium hypochlorite (CaOCl2). Its formula represents one calcium atom, one oxygen atom, and two chlorine atoms in the compound.

hindi.explanation: ब्लीचिंग पाउडर का रासायनिक सूत्र CaOCl₂ है। यह कैल्शियम ऑक्सीक्लोराइड के रूप में जाना जाता है और इसका उपयोग रंग निकालने में किया जाता है। अन्य विकल्प कैल्शियम ऑक्साइड, कैल्शियम कार्बोनेट और कैल्शियम हाइड्रॉक्साइड हैं, जो ब्लीचिंग पाउडर के रूप में उपयोग नहीं होते हैं।

questions.original_question: The official enumeration of population done periodically is called _______.

english.explanation: A census is the official and systematic count of a population, providing demographic, economic, and social data. It is distinct from estimates or records.

hindi.explanation: जनगणना एक आधिकारिक गणना है जो देश की जनसंख्या का निर्धारण करती है। अन्य विकल्प जनसांख्यिकीय गणना, अनुमान और आंकड़े केवल जनगणना के अर्थ को दर्शाते हैं लेकिन उसका सीधा नामकरण नहीं है।

questions.original_question: Which Indian music director was awarded Japan&#39;s Fukuoka prize - 2016 for his outstanding contribution in creating, preserving and showcasing South Asian traditional fusion music?

english.explanation: A.R. Rahman was awarded Japan's Fukuoka Prize in 2016 for his contributions to South Asian traditional fusion music. He is a globally acclaimed Indian music composer.

hindi.explanation: ए. आर. रहमान को दक्षिण एशियाई पारंपरिक फ्यूजन संगीत में अपने उत्कृष्ट योगदान के लिए फुकुओका पुरस्कार-2016 से सम्मानित किया गया था। अन्य विकल्प विशाल भारद्वाज, प्रीतम चक्रवर्ती और एम. एम. किरवानी हैं जो इस पुरस्कार के योग्य नहीं थे।

questions.original_question: When did the Indian Independence Act receive the British royal assent?

english.explanation: The Indian Independence Act received royal assent on July 18, 1947, formalizing the transfer of power, which led to India's independence on August 15, 1947.

hindi.explanation: भारतीय स्वतंत्रता अधिनियम को ब्रिटिश शाही स्वीकृति जुलाई 1947 में मिली थी। जून 1947 में पारित किया गया था, लेकिन स्वीकृति जुलाई में हुई।

questions.original_question: Wood&#39;s Despatch is related with ______.

english.explanation: Wood's Despatch (1854) was a British administrative communication that advocated for the establishment of a structured education system in India.

hindi.explanation: वुड्स डिस्पैच शिक्षा नीति से संबंधित है। यह 1854 में ब्रिटिश शासन के दौरान शिक्षा नीति के विकास के लिए जारी एक महत्वपूर्ण सूचना थी।

questions.original_question: What is the purpose of the Licensing Policy in India?

options.value: <span style="">To promote benefits to a particular group</span>
<span style="">To maintain the identity of an area</span>
<span style="">To show power of the government</span>

english.explanation: The Licensing Policy in India (1948–1991) aimed to regulate industrial growth, prevent monopolies, and promote economic development across regions.

hindi.explanation: भारत में लाइसेंसिंग नीति का उद्देश्य क्षेत्रीय समानता को बढ़ावा देना था, विशिष्ट समूहों को लाभ देना, क्षेत्र की पहचान बनाए रखना या सरकार की शक्ति दिखाना नहीं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following region was the capital of the Chalukyas?

english.explanation: Aihole was the capital of the early Chalukya dynasty in ancient South India. It is known for its rock-cut temples and historical significance.

hindi.explanation: चालुक्य राजवंश की राजधानी रायचुर थी। कांचीपुर चोलों की राजधानी थी, ऐहोल एक प्रमुख नगर था और कोलार बाद में के राजधानी बना।

questions.original_question: Who has taken charge as India&#39;s new Foreign Secretary in May 2022?

english.explanation: Vinay Mohan Kwatra assumed charge as India's Foreign Secretary in May 2022, succeeding Harsh Vardhan Shringla.

hindi.explanation: मई, 2022 में विनय मोहन क्वात्रा ने भारत के विदेश सचिव के रूप में पदभार ग्रहण किया। राजीव कुमार, टी. वी. सोमनाथन और राकेश मिश्रा अन्य विकल्प हैं जो इस पद के लिए अनुभव नहीं रखते हैं।

questions.original_question: ________ was conferred with &#39;Officier de la Legion d&#39;Honneur&#39;, France&#39;s highest civilian award, in 2009.

english.explanation: Lata Mangeshkar received France's 'Officier de la Legion d'Honneur' in 2009 for her contributions to music and cultural diplomacy.

hindi.explanation: लता मंगेशकर को 2009 में फ्रांस के सर्वोच्च नागरिक पुरस्कार 'ऑफिसियर डे ला लीजन डी'होनूर' से सम्मानित किया गया था। आशा भोंसले, एस. जानकी और के. एस. चित्रा अन्य महान गायिकाएं हैं लेकिन यह पुरस्कार उन्हें नहीं मिला।

questions.original_question: Rajiv Kumar assumed charge as the _____ Chief Election Commissioner of India in May 2022.

english.explanation: Rajiv Kumar was the 23rd Chief Election Commissioner of India, assuming charge in May 2022, succeeding Sushil Chandra.

hindi.explanation: राजीव कुमार ने मई 2022 में भारत के 25वें मुख्य चुनाव आयुक्त के रूप में पदभार लिया। 20वां, 27वां और 23वां क्रम सही नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following sports was initially known as Poona?

english.explanation: Kho-Kho, a traditional Indian sport, was historically referred to as 'Poona' during its revival and popularization in the 20th century.

hindi.explanation: खो-खो खेल को शुरू में पूना के नाम से जाना जाता था। बैडमिंटन, बेसबाल और बॉलीबाल अन्य खेल हैं जिनके नाम बदले नहीं गए हैं।

questions.original_question: Clove is an _______ indicator.

english.explanation: Clove acts as an olfactory indicator because its smell changes in acidic or basic conditions, distinguishing it from chemical or universal indicators.

hindi.explanation: लौंग एक गंधीय सूचक है क्योंकि इसके संपर्क में आने पर गंध के माध्यम से अम्ल या क्षार की पहचान होती है। रासायनिक, सार्वत्रिक और रस संवेदी सूचक नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is potash alum?

english.explanation: Potash alum (KAl(SO4)2·12H2O) is correctly represented as K2SO4·Al2(SO4)3·24H2O when expanded to show all ions and water of crystallization.

hindi.explanation: पोटाश फिटकरी का रासायनिक सूत्र K₂SO₄Al₂(SO₄)₃.24H₂O है। अन्य विकल्प नाइट्रोजन युक्त यौगिक या अल्टर्नेटिव सूत्र हैं।

questions.original_question: Dhondo Keshav Karve was an eminent Indian who championed the cause of ________.

english.explanation: Dhondo Keshav Karve was a prominent Indian social reformer and educator who pioneered women's education in India. He founded the first college for women in India (Maharashtra) and advocated for women's empowerment through education. The other options are incorrect: he opposed child marriages (option 1), supported widow remarriage (opposite of option 2), and challenged caste norms (opposite of option 3).

hindi.explanation: धोंडो केशव कर्वे भारत के प्रमुख समाज सुधारक थे, जिन्होंने महिला शिक्षा के प्रसार के लिए महत्वपूर्ण योगदान दिया। उन्होंने 1856 में महिला शिक्षा के लिए पहला स्कूल खोला और महिलाओं के शिक्षा के अधिकार को सामने लाया। उनका उद्देश्य महिलाओं के सामाजिक और आर्थिक स्वावलंबन को बढ़ावा देना था।

questions.original_question: <p>Identify the correct statement about green algae.</p>

options.value: <span style="">Green algae usually have a soft cell wall made of an inner layer of pectose.</span>
<span style="">Green algae usually have a rigid cell wall made of an inner layer of protein and an outer layer of fibre.</span>
<span style="">Green algae usually have a rigid cell wall made of an inner layer of cellulose and an outer layer of pectose.</span>
<span style="">Green algae usually have a rigid cell wall made of an inner layer of fat and an outer layer of protein.</span>

english.correct_answer: 3. Green algae usually have a rigid cell wall made of an inner layer of cellulose and an outer layer of pectose.
english.explanation: Green algae have cell walls composed of cellulose (inner layer) and pectose (outer layer), providing structural rigidity. Option 3 correctly describes this structure. Other options incorrectly mention protein, fat, or soft walls, which do not align with algal cell biology.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. हरे शैवाल में आमतौर पर सेल्युलोज की आतंरिक परत और पेक्टोज की बाह्य परत से बनी एक कठोर कोशिका भित्ति होती है।
hindi.explanation: हरे शैवाल की कोशिका भित्ति में सामान्य रूप से आंतरिक सेल्युलोज और बाहरी पेक्टोज तत्व होते हैं। यह संरचना शैवाल को ठोसता देती है और जलीय वातावरण में उनके अस्तित्व को बनाए रखती है। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं क्योंकि वे एक्सिन, प्रोटीन या वसा से संबंधित गलत जानकारी प्रस्तुत करते हैं।

english.explanation: The redistribution function of government budgets involves transferring income from higher-income groups to lower-income groups via taxes and subsidies. The allocation function (I) relates to resource distribution, not income equality. Thus, only II is correct.

hindi.explanation: सरकारी बजट का पुनर्वितरण कार्य (II) आय के वितरण से सीधे संबंधित है क्योंकि यह अमीर और गरीब के बीच आय के फैलाव को कम करने के लिए कर और प्रतिपूर्ति के माध्यम से किया जाता है। आवंटन कार्य (I) संसाधनों के उपयोग से संबंधित है, जो आय के वितरण से सीधे संबंधित नहीं है।

questions.original_question: The birthday of Prophet Muhammad is also celebrated by the name of ________.

english.explanation: Mawlid al-Nabi commemorates the birthday of Prophet Muhammad. Eid-ul-Fitr (option 1) marks the end of Ramadan, and Eid-ul-Adha (option 3) is the festival of sacrifice. Ramadan (option 2) is the holy month, not a birthday celebration.

hindi.explanation: मुहम्मद नबी के जन्मदिन को मीलाद अल-नबी के नाम से मनाया जाता है। ईद-उल-फितर रमजान के रोजे के बाद मनाया जाता है, जबकि ईद-उल-अजहा अमरीका के बलि बकरे के त्योहार के लिए जाना जाता है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following became one of the Deputy Chief Ministers of Uttar Pradesh in March 2022?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Brajesh Pathak was appointed as Deputy Chief Minister of Uttar Pradesh in March 2022. The other names listed are not associated with this role during that time.

hindi.explanation: मार्च 2022 में उत्तर प्रदेश के उपमुख्यमंत्रियों में ब्रजेश पाठक शामिल थे। अन्य विकल्पों में दिए गए नाम उस समय उपमुख्यमंत्री नहीं थे।

questions.original_question: In which state is the festival of Gudi Padwa specially celebrated?

english.explanation: Gudi Padwa is the traditional New Year festival celebrated in Maharashtra. It marks the beginning of the Chaitra month in the Hindu calendar.

hindi.explanation: गुड़ी पाड़वा महाराष्ट्र में मनाया जाने वाला एक प्रमुख त्योहार है। यह नववर्ष के त्योहार के रूप में मनाया जाता है और महाराष्ट्रीय संस्कृति का प्रतीक है।

questions.original_question: Who has been elected the 14<sup>th</sup> Vice President of India?

english.explanation: Jagdeep Dhankhar was elected the 14th Vice President of India in August 2022. Venkaiah Naidu (option 4) was his predecessor, and the other names are not relevant to this role.

hindi.explanation: जगदीप धनकड़ भारत के 14वें उपराष्ट्रपति हैं, जिन्हें अगस्त 2022 में चुना गया था। प्रतिभा बनर्जी उपराष्ट्रपति के रूप में पहली महिला थीं, जबकि वेंकैया नायडू राज्यपाल रहे हैं। मारग्रेट अल्वा ने उपराष्ट्रपति के रूप में निर्वाचित नहीं किया गया।

questions.original_question: In rainforests which kind of cultivation practices?

english.explanation: Rainforests often practice 'slash and burn' agriculture, where vegetation is cut and burned to clear land. Other options (dry farming, terrace farming, vertical farming) are not typical in rainforest regions.

hindi.explanation: वर्षावनों में जहां वनस्पति घनी होती है, काटो और जलाओ (शैल कृषि) की खेती प्रणाली आमतौर पर प्रयोग की जाती है। यह खेती प्रणाली उष्णकटिबंधीय क्षेत्रों में अनुकूल है। उर्ध्वाधर या सीढ़ीदार कृषि पहाड़ी क्षेत्रों में अधिक उपयुक्त होती है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following countries was the host of the ICC Men&#39;s T20 World Cup, 2021?

english.explanation: The ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2021 was hosted jointly by the West Indies and the USA. Other options refer to different tournaments or co-hosts.

hindi.explanation: 2021 के ICC पुरुष T20 विश्व कप का आयोजन UAE और ओमान के बीच किया गया था। अन्य विकल्पों में दिए गए देशों ने इस आयोजन की मेजबानी नहीं की।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is a characteristic of sedimentary rocks?

english.explanation: Lithification is the process by which sediments compact and harden to form sedimentary rocks. Lineation (option 1), bands (option 2), and foliation (option 3) are features of metamorphic rocks.

hindi.explanation: अवसादी चट्टानें परतों या बैंड के रूप में जमा होती हैं, जो उनकी विशेषता हैं। लिनिएशन और फोलिएशन मेटामॉर्फिक चट्टानों की विशेषता है, जबकि लिथिफिकेशन चट्टानों के निर्माण की प्रक्रिया है।

english.explanation: To find the average foreign trade of country P over 5 years, sum the values for all years and divide by 5. The values are 220, 200, 125, 115, and 85. Sum = 220 + 200 + 125 + 115 + 85 = 745. Average = 745 / 5 = 149.

hindi.explanation: देश P के 5 वर्षों के विदेशी व्यापार का औसत ज्ञात करने के लिए, हमें पहले सभी वर्षों में देश P के व्यापार के मानों को जोड़कर कुल मान निकालना होगा। देश P के मान हैं: 220, 200, 125, 115, 85। ये सभी मान जोड़ने पर: 220 + 200 + 125 + 115 + 85 = 745। अब, औसत निकालने के लिए कुल मान को वर्षों की संख्या से विभाजित करेंगे: 745 / 5 = 149।

questions.original_question: If the side of an equilateral triangle is 8 <span style="">cm</span>, then find the area of the triangle (correct to two decimal places).

english.explanation: The area of an equilateral triangle is (√3/4) × side². For a side of 8 cm, area = (√3/4) × 64 ≈ (1.732/4) × 64 ≈ 27.71 cm². Rounded to two decimal places, the answer is 27.71.

hindi.explanation: एक समबाहु त्रिभुज का क्षेत्रफल का सूत्र है: (√3/4) × भुजा²। यहाँ भुजा 8 सेमी है। इसलिए, क्षेत्रफल = (√3/4) × 8² = (√3/4) × 64 = 16√3। √3 का मान लगभग 1.732 है। इसलिए, 16 × 1.732 = 27.712, जिसे दो दशमलव स्थानों तक गोल करने पर 27.71 सेमी² प्राप्त होता है।
key_concepts: वर्गमूल का मान लगभग ज्ञात करना

questions.original_question: If the HCF of two numbers is 8 , then which of the following can NEVER be their LCM?

english.explanation: The LCM must be a multiple of the HCF (8). Check each option: 42 / 8 = 5.25, which is not an integer. Thus, 42 cannot be the LCM.

hindi.explanation: दो संख्याओं का महत्तम समापवर्तक (HCF) 8 है। दो संख्याओं का लघुत्तम स स (LCM) उनके HCF का गुणज होता है। दिए गए विकल्पों में 42, 8 से विभाज्य नहीं है। अतः 42 कभी भी लघुत्तम स स नहीं हो सकता।
key_concepts: HCF और LCM के बीच संबंध

questions.original_question: The average weight of apples in a basket is 50 <span style="">kg</span>. 6 more apples with the average weight of 60&nbsp;<span style="">kg</span> are added in the basket. If the average weight of the basket is increased by 5 <span style="">kg</span>, then find the number of apples in the basket originally.

english.explanation: Let original apples be x. Total weight: 50x. After adding 6 apples (total 60 kg), new average is 55. Equation: (50x + 360) / (x + 6) = 55. Solving gives x = 6.

hindi.explanation: माना टोकरी में मूल रूप से x सेब थे। प्रत्येक सेब का औसत वजन 50 किग्रा है। 6 अतिरिक्त सेबों का औसत वजन 60 किग्रा है। अतः कुल वजन में 6×60 = 360 किग्रा की वृद्धि होती है। नया औसत 55 किग्रा हो जाता है। समीकरण: (50x + 360)/(x + 6) = 55। इसे हल करने पर x = 6 प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: Find the simple interest on ₹2,700 for 8 months at 5 paise per rupee per month.

english.explanation: Simple Interest = P × R × T / 100. Here, P = 2700, R = 5% per month, T = 8 months. Interest = 2700 × 5 × 8 / 100 = 1080.

questions.original_question: Find the mean proportional between 27 and 300.

english.explanation: Mean proportional between 27 and 300 is x where 27/x = x/300 → x² = 27 × 300 = 8100 → x = 90.

hindi.explanation: मध्यानुपाती का मान ज्ञात करने के लिए, हमें दोनों संख्याओं के गुणनफल का वर्गमूल निकालना होता है। 27 और 300 का मध्यानुपाती √(27×300) = √8100 = 90 है।

questions.original_question: Ramesh claims that he is selling onions at Rs. 36 per kg, which costs him Rs. 40 per kg, but he gives 800 grams instead of 1 <span style="">kg</span>. Find Ramesh&#39;s percentage gain or loss.

hindi.explanation: रमेश की लागत मूल्य 40 रुपये प्रति किलो है, लेकिन वह 800 ग्राम के स्थान पर 800 ग्राम बेचता है। इसलिए उसकी वास्तविक लागत 40 × 0.8 = 32 रुपये है। वह 36 रुपये में बेचता है। लाभ = 36 - 32 = 4 रुपये। लाभ प्रतिशत = (4/32) × 100 = 12.5%।

questions.original_question:
<p>If in a triangle ABC as drawn in the figure, AB = AC and &ang;ACD = 130&deg;, then &ang;BAC is equal to:</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/05/F1_SSC_Arbaz_18-05-2023_Himanshu_D1.png" style="width: 186px; height: 140px;" /></p>

english.explanation: In triangle ABC, AB = AC (isosceles). Exterior angle ∠ACD = 130°, so ∠ACB = 50°. ∠BAC = 180° - 2 × 50° = 80°.

hindi.explanation: AB = AC है, इसलिए त्रिभुज ABC समद्विबाहु है। ∠ACD = 130°, जो बाहरी कोण है। बाहरी कोण के नियम के अनुसार, ∠ACD = ∠BAC + ∠ABC। चूँकि AB = AC, ∠ABC = ∠ACB होगा। माना ∠BAC = x, इसलिए ∠ABC = (180 - x)/2 होगा। x + (180 - x)/2 = 130 के समीकरण को हल करने पर x = 80 है।

questions.original_question: Three candidates were participating in an election. The person in third place got 20% of the total votes while the difference between the votes of the winner and the first runner-up was 20% of the total votes. If the difference between the votes of the first runner-up and the second runner-up was 37,000, how many votes did the winner receive?

english.explanation: Let total votes = V. Third place: 0.2V. Winner - First runner-up = 0.2V. Winner = 0.5V, First runner-up = 0.3V. Difference between First and Second runner-up: 0.3V - 0.2V = 0.1V = 37,000 → V = 370,000. Winner = 0.5 × 370,000 = 185,000.

hindi.explanation: माना कुल मत T हैं। तीसरे स्थान पर मत = 0.2T। बाकी मत = 0.8T। विजेता और प्रथम उपविजेता के मतों का अंतर = 0.2T। प्रथम उपविजेता और द्वितीय उपविजेता के मतों का अंतर = 37,000। समीकरणों को हल करने पर T = 1,85,000 प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>In the given figure, O is the centre of the circle and &ang;AOC = 140&deg;. Find &ang;ABC.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/05/F1_SSC_Arbaz_18-05-2023_Himanshu_D2.png" style="height: 156px; width: 160px;" /></p>

english.explanation: Central angle ∠AOC = 140°, reflex angle = 220°. Inscribed angle ∠ABC = half of reflex angle = 110°.

hindi.explanation: केंद्रीय कोण ∠AOC = 140° है। चाप AC द्वारा निर्मित अंतरित कोण ∠ABC है। अंतरित कोण केंद्रीय कोण का आधा होता है। इसलिए, ∠ABC = 140°/2 = 70° है। हल करने पर, वास्तविक चाप की लंबाई 220° है, जिसका अंतरित कोण 110° है।
key_concepts: केंद्रीय और अंतरित कोण के संबंध

questions.original_question: Find the remainder when we divide 3x<sup>4</sup>&nbsp;- 2x<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;+ 4x - 1 by 2x - 1.

english.explanation: Use Remainder Theorem: Substitute x = 1/2 into the polynomial. 3(1/2)^4 - 2(1/2)^2 + 4(1/2) - 1 = 11/16.

hindi.explanation: शेषफल ज्ञात करने के लिए, हमें x = 1/2 रखकर बहुपदी का मान निकालना होगा। 3x⁴ - 2x² + 4x - 1 में x = 1/2 रखने पर, मान 11/16 प्राप्त होता है।

english.explanation: Sushil's English marks: 75% of 200 = 150. Shyamu's: 65% of 200 = 130. Difference = 20 more.
Statement I is correct using algebraic identity. Statement II simplifies to k^8 - 1/k^8, not k^16 - 1/k^16.

hindi.explanation: अभिकथन I: (K + 1/K)² = K² + 2 + 1/K² = 144 → K² + 1/K² = 142। सही है। अभिकथन II: गुणनफल के गुणनखंडन द्वारा गणना करने पर, मान K⁸ - 1/K⁸ प्राप्त होता है, न कि K¹⁶ - 1/K¹⁶। इसलिए, अभिकथन II गलत है।

english.explanation: Calculate percentage increases: 1994 to 1995 has the smallest increase (6.12%).

hindi.explanation: पिछले वर्ष की तुलना में उत्पादन में प्रतिशत वृद्धि न्यूनतम है: 1994 में वृद्धि = (237 - 215)/215 × 100 ≈ 10.23%। यह सबसे कम है।

questions.original_question: If tan &theta; + cot &theta; = 12, then tan<sup>2</sup> &theta; + cot<sup>2</sup> &theta; is:

english.explanation: Given tanθ + cotθ = 12. Square both sides: tan²θ + cot²θ + 2 = 144 → tan²θ + cot²θ = 142.

hindi.explanation: tanθ + cotθ = 12 दिया गया है। दोनों पक्षों का वर्ग करने पर: tan²θ + 2 + cot²θ = 144। इसलिए, tan²θ + cot²θ = 142।

questions.original_question: Two trains are moving in the same direction at the speed of 36 <span style="">km</span>/<span style="">hr</span> and 48 <span style="">km</span><span style="">/</span><span style="">hr</span>. The time taken by faster train to cross a man sitting in the slower train is 33 seconds. What will be the length of the faster train?

english.explanation: The relative speed between the faster and slower train is 48 - 36 = 12 km/h. Converting to m/s: 12 × (5/18) = 10/3 m/s. The length of the faster train is relative speed × time: (10/3) × 33 = 110 metres.

hindi.explanation: दोनों ट्रेनों की सापेक्ष गति 48 किमी/घंटा - 36 किमी/घंटा = 12 किमी/घंटा है। इसे मीटर प्रति सेकंड (मी/से) में परिवर्तित करने पर: 12 × (5/18) = 10/3 मी/से ≈ 3.33 मी/से। तेज ट्रेन द्वारा धीमी ट्रेन में बैठे व्यक्ति को पार करने में लिया गया समय 33 सेकंड है। इसलिए, तेज ट्रेन की लंबाई = सापेक्ष गति × समय = (10/3) × 33 = 110 मीटर।

questions.original_question: The radius of a hemisphere is 5.6 <span style="">cm</span>. What will be its volume?

options.value: <span style="">367.95&nbsp;</span><span style="">cm<span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em;font-size:10.5px;">3</span></span>
<span style="">195 .95&nbsp;</span><span style="">cm</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;">3</span>
<span style="">380&nbsp;</span><span style="">cm</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;">3</span>
<span style="">265.65&nbsp;</span><span style="">cm</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;">3</span>

english.explanation: Volume of a hemisphere is (2/3)πr³. For r = 5.6 cm: (2/3) × π × (5.6)³ ≈ (2/3) × π × 175.616 ≈ 367.95 cm³.

questions.original_question: 12 men and 12 women can complete a piece of work in 9 days. 6 men and 15 women can complete the same work in 12 days. How long (in days) would it take 9 women to complete half the work?

english.explanation: Let the work rates of men and women be m and w. From the equations 12m + 12w = 1/9 and 6m + 15w = 1/12, solving gives w = 1/324. For 9 women: 9w = 1/36. Time to complete half the work is (1/2) ÷ (1/36) = 18 days.

questions.original_question: If (a + 1)<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;+ (a + 2)<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;= 16 then what is the value of 40 + 12a + 4a<sup>2</sup>?

english.explanation: Expanding (a+1)² + (a+2)² = 2a² + 6a + 5 = 16 → 2a² + 6a = 11. Multiply by 2: 4a² + 12a = 22. Adding 40: 4a² + 12a + 40 = 22 + 40 = 62.

hindi.explanation: हमें दिया गया है कि (a + 1)² + (a + 2)² = 16 है। इसे हल करने पर हमें (a² + 2a + 1) + (a² + 4a + 4) = 16 मिलता है। इसे सरल करने पर हमें 2a² + 6a + 5 = 16 मिलता है। इसे आगे सरल करने पर 2a² + 6a = 11 हो जाता है। अब, हम प्रश्न में दिए गए व्यंजक 40 + 12a + 4a² को हल करते हैं। इसे 40 + 2(6a + 2a²) के रूप में लिखा जा सकता है। हम पहले से जानते हैं कि 2a² + 6a = 11 है, इसलिए 40 + 2(6a + 2a²) = 40 + 2 × 11 = 40 + 22 = 62 होगा। इसलिए सही उत्तर 62 है।
key_concepts: हल करके व्यंजक का मान ज्ञात करना
बीजगणितीय कार्यक्रम की जांच और सरलीकरण

questions.original_question: If&nbsp; tan A = 10/15, then what will be the value of cos<sup>2</sup> A?

english.explanation: tan A = 10/15 = 2/3. In a right triangle, cos A = adjacent/hypotenuse = 3/√13. Squaring gives 9/13, which simplifies to 225/325.

hindi.explanation: tan A = 10/15 = 2/3 है। त्रिभुज में, विपरीत भुजा 2 और आसन्न भुजा 3 मान लेते हुए, कर्ण √(2² + 3²) = √13 होगा। cos A = 3/√13, इसलिए cos²A = (3/√13)² = 9/13। 9/13 को सरल करने पर 225/325 प्राप्त होता है (9 × 25 = 225, 13 × 25 = 325)। इसलिए सही उत्तर विकल्प 3 है।

questions.original_question: If <span class="math-tex">\(x+\frac{1}{x}=7\)</span>, find the value of <span class="math-tex">\(x^3+\frac{1}{x^3}\)</span>.

english.explanation: Using the identity (x + 1/x)³ = x³ + 1/x³ + 3(x + 1/x). Given x + 1/x = 7: 7³ = x³ + 1/x³ + 21 → 343 - 21 = 322.

questions.original_question: The volume of the sphere is 38,808 <span style="">cm<sup>3</sup></span>. What is the surface area of the sphere?

options.value: <span style="">4455&nbsp;</span><span style="">cm</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;">2</span>
<span style="">4433&nbsp;</span><span style="">cm</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;">2</span>
<span style="">5544&nbsp;</span><span style="">cm</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;">2</span>
<span style="">3344&nbsp;</span><span style="">cm</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;">2</span>

english.explanation: Volume of sphere (4/3)πr³ = 38,808 cm³ → r = 21 cm. Surface area is 4πr² = 4 × (22/7) × 21² = 5544 cm².

hindi.correct_answer: 3. 5544&nbsp;<span style="color: rgb(33, 37, 41);">सेमी</span><span style="position: relative;  line-height: 0; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em;font-size:10.5px;">2</span>
hindi.explanation: गोले के आयतन का सूत्र है: (4/3)πr³ = 38,808 सेमी³। त्रिज्या (r) निकालने के लिए, हम समीकरण को हल करते हैं: r³ = (3 × 38,808) / (4π)। π के मान के रूप में 22/7 लेने पर, r³ = 9261 होता है, जिससे r = 21 सेमी प्राप्त होता है। अब, पृष्ठीय क्षेत्रफल का सूत्र 4πr² है। r = 21 सेमी रखने पर: 4 × (22/7) × (21)² = 5544 सेमी²। इसलिए सही उत्तर विकल्प 3 है।
key_concepts: गोले के पृष्ठीय क्षेत्रफल का सूत्र: 4πr²
त्रिज्या निकालने के लिए आयतन से त्रिज्या की घनमूल गणना
मानक गणितीय अनुमान जैसे π = 22/7 का उपयोग

english.explanation: Assuming Group-B represents 35% of the pie chart (as 35% of 360° = 126°), the central angle is 126°.

hindi.explanation: पाई आलेख में केंद्रीय कोण की गणना करने के लिए, प्रतिशत को कुल 360° से गुणा किया जाता है। यदि ग्रुप-B का प्रतिशत 35% है (जैसा कि अक्सर प्रश्नों में दिया जाता है), तो केंद्रीय कोण = (35/100) × 360° = 126° होगा। अतः सही उत्तर 126° है।

questions.original_question: If 4 tan &theta; = 3, then <span class="math-tex">\(\frac{4 \sin θ-\cos θ+1}{4 \sin θ+\cos θ-1}=\)</span>&nbsp;_________.

english.explanation: tan θ = 3/4 implies sin θ = 3/5 and cos θ = 4/5. Substituting into the expression: (4*(3/5) - 4/5 +1)/(4*(3/5) +4/5 -1) = (13/5)/(11/5) = 13/11.

questions.original_question: At a Christmas sale, all the goods in a shop are on sale at 30% discount. If Jasmine buys a skirt marked at ₹800 , how much would she need to pay?

english.explanation: 30% discount on ₹800 = ₹240. Final price: ₹800 - ₹240 = ₹560.

key_concepts: बिक्री मूल्य की गणना (बिक्री मूल्य = अंकित मूल्य - छूट)

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 1.

english.explanation: The context likely requires a word indicating intentional creation or planning. 'Designed' fits best as it implies deliberate planning, unlike 'damaged' or 'glorified'.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 2.

english.explanation: The blank likely refers to a positive attribute. 'Useful' is the only option with a positive connotation that fits common contexts like describing beneficial substances.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 3.

english.explanation: The phrase 'interested in' is standard. 'In' is the correct preposition for expressing interest in a subject.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 4.

english.explanation: Validation implies confirmation of accuracy. 'Validated' fits contexts where results or findings are confirmed, unlike 'built' or 'detected'.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 5.

english.explanation: Accumulated means gathered over time. This fits contexts describing gradual accumulation of resources, unlike 'endangered' or 'granted'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Substitute the underlined words with the option that is closest in meaning to it.</strong></p>

<p>Give us <u>some room for improvement</u>.</p>

options.value: <span style="">room in a house for improvement</span>

english.explanation: 'Some room for improvement' metaphorically means a chance to improve. 'Opportunity for improvement' is the closest literal substitute.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the underlined word.</strong></p>

<p>The <u>antonym</u> of a word is sometimes a prefix added to the actual word.</p>

english.explanation: An 'antonym' is a word with the opposite meaning. A 'synonym' is a word with the same meaning, making it the direct antonym of 'antonym'.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the sentences that contains no spelling errors.</strong>

options.value: <span style="">Ryan squaked about losing his job owing to a leg injury.</span>
<span style="">Ryan squeked about losing his job owing to a leg injury.</span>
<span style="">Ryan squawked about losing his job owing to a leg injury.</span>
<span style="">Ryan skuawked about losing his job owing to a leg injury.</span>

english.correct_answer: 3. Ryan squawked about losing his job owing to a leg injury.
english.explanation: 'Squawked' is the correct spelling. The other options have misspellings ('squaked', 'squeked', 'skuawked').

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been split into four segments. Identify the segment that contains a grammatical error.</strong></p>

<p>He does not/ know how to/ draw quickly/ and straightly.</p>

english.explanation: 'Straightly' is grammatically incorrect. The correct adverb is 'straight' (e.g., 'draw quickly and straight').

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the word &#39;obscene&#39; from the following sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Vijay was suspended from duty because he gave dirty and prejudiced remarks to his female colleagues in the office.</p>

english.explanation: 'Obscene' refers to indecent or offensive language. In the context, 'dirty' is the direct synonym for the remarks described.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct direct form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>We asked them who had called them.</p>

options.value: <span style="">We said to them, &quot;Who are calling you?&quot;</span>
<span style="">We said to them, &quot;Who calls you?&quot;</span>
<span style="">We said to them, &quot;Who has called him?&quot;</span>
<span style="">We said to them, &quot;Who has called you?&quot;</span>

english.correct_answer: 4. We said to them, "Who has called you?"
english.explanation: The past perfect tense ('has called') is correct for reporting a past action. The pronoun shifts from 'them' to 'you' in direct speech.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option that can substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Mr. Alfred hasn&#39;t thought of his friend since he went abroad. <u>Out of sight, out of mind</u>.</p>

options.value: <span style="">Once you leave the country, your memories vanish</span>
<span style="">He lost his memory, as he could not see</span>
<span style="">If you do not see someone, you forget about them.</span>

english.correct_answer: 3. If you do not see someone, you forget about them.
english.explanation: The phrase 'out of sight, out of mind' means forgetting someone not visible. Option 3 captures this meaning clearly.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option that can substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence. If there is no need to substitute it, select &#39;No substitution&#39;.</strong></p>

<p>There are many people in the world <u>who believe that</u> the earth is flat.</p>

english.explanation: 'Who believe that' is grammatically correct. The other options have tense or subject-verb agreement errors.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the underlined word.</strong></p>

<p>An autoimmune disease is a condition in which your <u>immune</u> system mistakenly attacks your body.</p>

english.explanation: An 'immune' system is resistant. 'Susceptible' means vulnerable, making it the correct antonym.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option that can substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>The yellow dress purchased by you is not much <u>different than the one</u> I have brought.</p>

english.explanation: 'Different from' is the standard phrase for comparing two things. 'Different than' is less formal and typically incorrect in standard English.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the underlined word.</strong></p>

<p>Never teach your children to <u>flout</u> the rules and regulations of their educational institution.</p>

english.explanation: The word 'flout' means to treat with contempt or disregard. Among the options, 'Mock' (to treat with ridicule) is the closest synonym. 'Revere' is the opposite (to respect), while 'Divulge' and 'Monitor' are unrelated.

The correct order logically progresses from the problem of being aimless (D) to the importance of having a goal (C), the benefit of a meaningful aim (A), and the consequence of shattered goals (B). This sequence (DCAB) ensures coherence.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>A perfectionist</p>

english.explanation: A perfectionist is someone who is exceptionally attentive to detail. 'Meticulous' directly corresponds to this trait. 'Omniscient' (all-knowing) and 'Optimist' (positive outlook) are unrelated.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct passive form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>She will present the paper next week.</p>

options.value: <span style="">The paper could be presented next week by her.</span>
<span style="">The paper will be presented next week by her.</span>
<span style="">The paper would be presented next week by her.</span>
<span style="">The paper can be presented next week by her.</span>

english.correct_answer: 2. The paper will be presented next week by her.
english.explanation: The passive form of 'She will present the paper' uses 'will be presented' to match the future tense. The preposition 'by' correctly introduces the agent (her).

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Parts of the following sentence have been given as options. Select the option that contains a grammatical error.</strong></p>

<p>He was/ paid handsomely for/ his ability to handle/ the crowd skillful.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'skillful' is an adjective modifying 'crowd,' which is incorrect. The adverb 'skillfully' should be used to modify the verb 'handle' (e.g., 'handle the crowd skillfully').

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Complete the following collocation.</strong></p>

<p>It is easier to make a promise than to _______ a promise.</p>

english.explanation: The collocation 'keep a promise' is widely recognized as the correct pairing. 'Maintain' or 'follow' are not idiomatic in this context.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct active form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>How his problems will be fixed by you?</p>

options.value: <span style="">How are you fixing his problems?</span>
<span style="">How will you fix his problems?</span>

english.correct_answer: 3. How will you fix his problems?
english.explanation: The passive-to-active voice conversion changes the structure. The question form 'How will you fix...' correctly transforms the passive sentence into active voice while maintaining the interrogative form.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Rectify the sentence by selecting the correct spelling of the underlined word.</strong></p>

<p>The nine-tailed fox is a <u>mythicil</u> creature from Japanese culture.</p>

english.explanation: 'Mythical' is the correct spelling, derived from 'myth.' The other options are misspellings: 'mythicil,' 'mythycal,' and 'mithical' are incorrect.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>The health personnel advised to ________ of unhealthy food habits if we want to maintain our cardio-vascular health.</p>

english.explanation: 'Steer clear of' means to avoid, making it the correct idiom to fill the blank. The other options are unrelated to avoiding unhealthy habits.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>In all her sorrow she must weep or she will ____.</p>

english.explanation: The sentence implies that suppressing sorrow (not weeping) could lead to suffering. 'Suffer' fits as the consequence, while 'die' or 'cry' are either extreme or redundant.
